text: Approval for firmware modifications for the Ingenio and Accolade families of pacemaker and cardiac resynchronization therapy-pacemaker pulse generators and the associated Programmer Software Applications to support the addition of features including Signal Artifact Monitor, Automatic Lead Recognition, MRI Protection Mode, and RightRate pacing. The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade names listed for pacemakers and CRT P devices.. Adaptive rate pacing is indicated for patients exhibiting chronotropic incompetence and who would benefit from increased pacing rates concurrent with increases in minute ventilation and/or physical activity.
